translations: adj.起泡沫的；嘶嘶作响的（fizzy 的变形）

sentences.sentence: It became the fizziest scandal in Japanese corporate history.
sentences.translation: 这是日本财团史上最为泡沫横飞的丑闻。

sentences.sentence: Casino feels betrayed. It was about to take control of the biggest retailer in one of the world's fizziest markets.
sentences.translation: 法商Casino感觉遭人背叛，该公司原本正准备掌控全球最大泡沫市场之一的最大零售业者。
